CmdLine: set -e       && apt-get -y update       && apt-get -y dist-upgrade       && apt-get -y install --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests         g++ gcc make mercurial zlib1g-dev parallel       && apt-get -y autoremove       && apt-get clean       && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -e       && hg clone http://last.cbrc.jp/last /usr/local/src/last       && cd /usr/local/src/last       && make       && make install
Commands.Name: run
